description: Refactor tag chips UI to render separately from prompt cards instead of embedded within them. Move tag selection to dedicated section below prompt grid or in sidebar panel.
notes: Current implementation embeds tag chips inside each prompt card, causing visual clutter and state management issues. Better UX: Select prompt first, then show relevant tags in separate section. Benefits: cleaner prompt cards, clearer workflow (select prompt → select tags → attach files → export), easier state management (tags only render for selected prompt).
